values:
Who would have thought I was going to make it to 16?

 

 

 

not I.

<3

People are stupid.

On a lighter note, I got ass, and that's always good.

But boys are still stupid.

"I can't love your eyes; it's all your fault."

Brittany.

Brittany Simone Golder's Aliases

Your movie star name: Scooby Snacks Michael
Your fashion designer name is Brittany Rome
Your socialite name is Binty Las Vegas
Your fly girl / guy name is B Gol
Your detective name is Hippopotatmous River Hill
Your barfly name is Hot Pocket Vodka
Your soap opera name is Simone Riva Avenue
Your rock star name is Jolly Rancher Motorcycle
Your star wars name is Bripri Gol

The Amazing Meganame Generator

Passed my driver's ed final today. Went to Nate's with Dave and Lorren- fun bed. Ate Lido's Pizza. Listening to Aerosmith.


Thats music in my blood.

 

In conclusion,

boredom at its best.

Everything has been changing:

+ bought a car
    named him Napoleon

+ school blows

+ boys are stupid.

+ I'm taking Driver's Ed which ends this Saturday
   with Sam and Josh

+ people are becoming more fake by the second
   and it's sad they find that it's "cool"

+ I'm going to Homecoming with Mikey B
   looking for people to be in our little dinner group, want in?

 

"she leaves love stains"

Brittany.

So... things have been looking up.

"Blacks and blues are how I loved you."

Brittany.

I'm not going to lie.... yesterday was interesting.

But not in an awful if-I-was-suicidal-this-is-something-I'd-starve-myself-over-and-then-make-a-death-wish way.

"Running with scissors wasn't smart, I tripped and cut open your heart."

Brittany.

... I've been neglecting you so.

After calling the school and bitching several times, I FINALLY established my schedule with my Rico-suave kicks:

1. World History Honors- Gray
2. Early Childhood Development- Welsh
3. SAT Prep- Hubal
4A. English Honors- Martin
4B. Chemistry GT- Jewett
5. Algebra 2 GT- Demaree
6. Psychology AP- Napolitano

In other news:

  • I saw my old best friend who I haven't seen since 8th grade
  • Work sucks, as does favoritism
  • I'm going to Six Flags tomorrow
  • I'm now single
  • I got hotass chucks
  • I got a friggin' SWEET digital camera for my birthday and will be posting my new kicks +

....2 weeks mother fuckers.

Brittany.

The Fuzzy Barney kicks.

We know how MJ does.

The constipation builds.

The purple Russian people eaters...obviously in it's natural habitat.

The mother of pearls.

Agent 00394475

Violence is always the answer when yo' a New Yok' Russian gangster...

When silly foreigners realize what they just ate in a Russian household...

The usual Baby-Eating Ritual at the end of a sex-fest between girl friends..

Rocky Horror Picture Show Part IIII COMING SOON...

I'm officially a myspace whore.

I feel dirty.

On another note, in two days I will be home.

Brittany. ♥

NumOfTheBEAST***: its like pairing an arab person with a bomb..together till death does them part

He's talking about us. A guy that's after my own heart. New Jersey gangstas.

So my weekend went accordingly:

Friday:

Volunteered at the hospital and strutted my ninja skills by stealing me a Panera Bread Cinnamon Crunch Bagel w/ cream cheese from the lounge. Bossman drove me to Spencer's <3 house where I "got my crabs from Scooter's". A.K.A. best crabs I've ever eaten. Then we went back to his house and Mad and Robin made the best fucking brownies. I had one with cookies n' cream ice cream on top. The best god damn brownie I've had this year. Went home around 9:30 because I have a dick as a father.

Saturday:

Got up at 8. Packed shit and bummed a ride to New York. Saw my cousin's son who's my what? "Nephew". He just turned one and he WOULDN'T get off of me. Ugly baby, but it was cute how obsessed he was with me. I'm going to have kids, I swear to it. Once he got on my lap, he wouldn't get off of it; whether to drink or even see my aunt who's the only one he liked who was in the room. Craddle-Robber. Went to Sahara. I wish they had a Sahara restaurant around here. Then we bought two dozen New York bagels because they are the best in the whole fucking world. Nobody in Maryland and appreciate good food. Idiots. Left after dinner and drove to New Jersey. Went to bed at 9 because I had an attack of the killer cramps.

Sunday:

Woke up at 9. Left at 10 and stopped at the Russian store. HAHA suckers. I'll try to leave some Russian food and bagels for Spencer <3 but it'll be hard. Came home around 2. Went to Giant because the house was bloody empty of food. Later on la familia is going to el cine a veen War of the Worlds. For you non-biligual people that means "the movies to see War of the Worlds". My baby left this morning and won't be back until next Sunday. It's quite depressing but at least this vacation I'll be able to talk to him every day. God I love that kid.

The Best Part of This Weekend: My sister Becky is with my grandparents in New Jersey for the next 3 weeks. A.K.A. house to myself and certain others.

"Lactating *****: i think you are gonna be a porn star." Baby, you just made my day.

Brittany.

.... and I'm back.



I got to drink every day, gamble in the casino, got hit on by 40-year-olds, saw 50-year-old men in thongs, went Banana Boat-ing, had an awful nightmare, bought sweet 80's earrings for $1, got a killer tan, wrote a letter, and saw my 7th grade foreign language teacher Mrs. Heavy D at the airport.


... and then I teared when I heard your voice on the phone...

Brown Eyes.

I read this in one girl's Xanga and I decided I had to say something before I left for the deck to write my message in a bottle...

I WANT A GUY. . . .


who would move the hair away from my eyes and then kiss me. done; and when I'm pouring my tears out.
hold my hand in line at the mall and make all the girls jealous. holds my hands everywhere.
a pretty boy. but not so pretty that i feel akward. so pretty he makes me want to cry.
someone who would think i was beautiful if i dressed so trashy it was classy. in boxers, boyshorts and a tank top.
someone who would sing to me at random moments. constantly.
who would let me sleep on their chest. who shushes me when I'm afraid of crushing him.
someone who is more goofy than romantic. laughter makes the pain subside more so than your flowers.
but knows the right things to say and do at the right times. whether I'm crying or not.
a boy who would beat the shit out of someone if they called me fat. or if they got so physically flirty your jealousy turned to beautiful confessions of feared loss.
i want someone who would call me 3 times a day if he went away. and text message me 10 times.
he would apologize for calling too much and no matter how many times i tell him its okay, he still does it and i dont get sick of it.
someone who would let me gossip to him and would just smile and agree with everything i said. because seemingly he knows exactly where I'm coming from and doesn't make me feel guilty for gossiping either, or will join me in the chat.
he would throw stuffed animals at me when i acted dumb and then dog pile on me and kiss me a millon times. and beat me with inflatable baseball bats, and start the pillow fights.
we would bet kisses on who could beat who on a playstation game that is a millon years old. and bet who loves who more on a game of mini-midget pool.
and someone who would make fun of me just to make me laugh. or even better, do it to make me see the truth.
he would surprise me with 25 cent rings.
and we would have contests of how far we could spit our gum. or joke about how far your spit traveled when you spit on me.
he would take me to the park and put his hands around my waist and give me big bear hugs all the time. or do the same in front of hundreds of people at the mall, or alone in my house.
someone who would kiss my neck just to have a reason to tell me how much he likes my new perfume.
and at night we would dance in our pajamas and we'd always take pictures in photo booths.. or dance on my hardwood floors; me twirling until dizziness kicks in, then laughing at the simplicity.
he would never turn down a trip to the boardwalk
and we'd play tag on the beach.
he would tell all his friends about me and smile when he did it.  and I'd know because his friends tell me what they've heard and that he won't shut up.
we would sit on the kitchen floor and eat peanut butter and jelly sandwiches..
and we'd make out in the pouring rain. at a 5-acre house belonging to my dad's best friend; after fighting about something stupid. and before-hand burn your skin in front of the fire pit just to make me a smores.
he would tell me when he didint think something looked good and i wouldnt mind. because the only one who I want to look good for is him.
he would TRY to teach me how to play the guitar but we'd just end up laughing at eachohter.
he would run his fingers through my hair even if it was dirty. and I would kiss him with his unbrushed teeth that one time...
he would share lollipops with me. 
and get along with all of my friends.  but because he's my best friend, that's not important to do.
he would never be afraid to say "i love you" infront of his firends. and his family.
and we would argue of silly things then make up. after five minutes of tears, then dry them and laugh at our stupidity and agree that if we lived our lives arguing only about these silly things, then it would be the best.
i want a boy who would take me to target to just make fun of some of the stuff there.
we would kiss at midnight on new years
and make funny faces at eachother when im on the phone. and eating.
i want a boy who would count stars with me.
and be friends with my family. and buy my father a gift for his birthday.
i want someone who would stay home with me on a friday night just to help me make a dinner and watch moives together under the same blanket. and run around doing hunny-dos with me while I get my hair cut and go to Giant.
and squirt water guns at eachother in the house. while I re-filled his with warm water because mine was broken, and he didn't get angry.
someone who would tell me im beautiful but not too often .. at the perfect times, whiling staring me in the eyes and not else-where.
someone who would look me in the eye and tell me something serious that was also funny and make me promise not to laugh. and tell me that his secret of "I love you" is something serious, that I've never heard before from him.
someone who would make me laugh like no one else could. who does make me laugh WHEN no one else can.
someone who would hold me closer than normal when im sick, and would play with my hair. who when I'm sick, lets me sleep when we only have a short period of time to see each other, gets me medicine that tastes like shit and makes me drink it because he wants me better than anything, who will feel sick because I feel sick.
we would buy tons of disposible cameras and take lots of pictures.
but mostly..i want someone who would be my best friend and would never lie to me or break my heart . . . .  whom I found to be the greatest love of my life.

 

After reading that, realizing that this is what most people are looking for, and answering to almost each comment with a story of my own, I decided that what we have is more real and fairy-tale-ish than anything I could have imagined. That miracles happen only based on the fact that you were brought to me in a time of need.

And when yesterday we re-capped the our first everythings, I realized that I can not ever forget them. And how touched I was that you remembered our first REAL kiss when I retold everything else. And you didn't make me feel stupid for re-telling all of the details, even though you were there. When you smiled and told me you always liked me secretly. I remembered when I fluttered when you told me how you thought I was cute the first time you saw me, even though you've told me that before.

And everything seems so much brighter when you have something back to reflect on. When shit is happening and you know that it was better than this; and that it will always stay constant because best friends torn apart for months have come back together more than either of them could have hoped for.

So when I woke up this morning at 8:30, put on my bikini, headed for the deck, finished my book, and layed there re-capping our first everythings all over again, as well as something I cry at every time you tell me, I knew that we were real. No matter what they say about our day and age, I know that we are as real as the 30-something couples, maybe even happier because we lull in our semi-naive dreams, and never let go of the moment.

I dedicate this entire entry to you, Spencer David Stevens, because I can never say how much I appreciate you too much. Nothing in this world has stayed as constant as my undying devotion and admiration for you.

Your's truly,
Brittany.

This is what happens when you find out your weekend is going to be the wildest yet.

Brittany.

Someone who needs no name but will point to herself right now just got a little bit tanner, a little bit more bored, and probably a little bit fatter.

And since Rahna posted her pictures, I'm going to steal two and post the gangsta-white-trailer-trash ones of me.

This is your face on drugs wearing a pink hat.

And then there's the crackhead Mr. Hubal's last-class-of-the-last-day-of-school trip.

 

I'm pretty sure I should go for a face transplant. <3

I wish I was on a pirate ship jumping off the plank to swim off the coast of the Dominican Republic right about now.

"Justa***: haha your my 360 day a year 24/7 valentine"

Brittany.

Due to certain circumstances, I am using my Barney blanket which I didn't know I still had instead of my comforter.

"LOU GET IN THE CLOSET!"

Brittany.

My very first baseball game...

Just happened to be with my baby <3, his dad, and his sister. We had the BEST seats in the whole fucking park. We were so close that my blind eyes could bloody see the sweat on these guys and the dirt being kicked under their feet. It was great.

First thing on the list: Buy plastic baseball bat.

Then we let the ass-whooping commense. Spence and I bought a shitload of food (which is so expensive I basically had to sell blood). And I have to say, Camden Yards has the best fucking fresh-squeezed-old-fashioned-lemonade-made-by-a-mexican that I have ever had in my life. True story.

So we all left around 9:30; 8th inning, 2:8 Orioles.

Tomorrow's Father's Day. Mom, Becky, and I chipped in and bought dad a metric set of sockets. Then I came home tonight and saw that my mother bought him a $500 red ball-bearings set of drawers. They're hott. With two "t"s.

After eating a tub of popcorn I am compelled to wash my face.

"It's the shit Dad!" "You don't know how much of the shit it REALLY is."

Brittany.

Yesterday was the sweetest best last day of school. It's been made official.

Went to Spencer's <3 house and rode on the Goped, swung on his swings, watched; Mortal Kombat, Hitch. and Family Guy Season 3 Disc 2, napped, ate Chinese food, and saw the most amazing sunset from the back seat of his mother's car. And even though it all sounds like the setting of the gayest movie ever; es actualmente la verdad

Now it's the first day of summer and I'm starting it by starting my volunteer work at GBMC. At least I got into pediatrics.... ROWR.

"If I could be your first real heart ache, I'd do it over again."

Brittany.

Who the fuck rams into the back of a school bus?

 

... an idiot.

Five minutes away from my house the bus stops with a clunk. If it weren't for the fact that I had to pee for two hours straight, I would have been okay; but I wasn't. Anyway, the guy hit the bus so far that the bus's exhaust pipe totally rammed into the guy's headlights. All the way through, leaking antifreeze and gas. Thankfully, Mr. Brown and the board aren't too bright, nor do they care, so Lauren's mom drove me home (we live in the same neighborhood). When I got home, I peed; and it was the most relaxing pee of my life. And so I leave with the question: What asshole misses a big yellow bus?

Dark skies and diamond eyes.

Brittany.

I could go for some Chinese right about now.

 

FYI: The geometry final was like flying.

FYI #2: My hair is soft like fuck because I just chopped off 5 inches.

FYI#3: Certain people bug me because they're idiots.

FYI#4: My eyes burn real bad.

FYI#5: I love italian ices.

FYI#6: Three bloody days left.

FYI#7: Biology and Spanish finals tomorrow. In which Spanish I'm going to yell the fuck out of Wolters for being such a horrible teacher.

FYI#8: I'm going to miss Kevin; I'm not gonna lie.

"Hey girl, you've got to take this moment, then let it slip away. Let go of complicated feelings; then there's no price to pay."

Brittany.

Mom says I should blame it on the stress. I say I should blame it on my past with you and my ability to fuck with us <3.

.... I wonder if I'll get an ulcer in the future.

"Me thinkin."

Brittany.

A.K.A. Let's skip the kissing. Less cuddling, more beating.

That sounds about right.

"Go on ahead and let it fade away."

Brittany.

If you could be my garage band king I would be your punk rock princess. If I could be your first real heartache, I'd do it over again.

I could be your heroine. ♥

Brittany.

P.T.O. Yesterday was most fantastic loves.

I accidentally fucked up my entire journal. Thankfully I'm literate and fixed it. Now I know how to do all this crap. It excites me.

I love this background picture.

Only you ♥ could make me cry out of happiness. Tomorrow's my day to take care of YOU.

"When you're sick, I am too".

Brittany.

My hands went numb <3. My ring is around my neck. My school week is over. And tomorrow I want to go to the carnival.

 

Just like the notebook. Except in real life, 40 years later, with black people there, and in Howard County.

Brittany.

I've never been so dizzy in my life. 

It's true.

I would say that it feels like I'm high right now but since I've never been, I can't. And so I'll describe this feeling as if I sucked in WAY too much helium and my head's about to implode. Scary thing is, I could feel that happening right now...

I'm sick.

1. Reply with your name and I will write something I like about you.
2. I will then tell what song reminds me of you.
3. If I were to apply an o'clock to you, I'll tell you what it would be.
4. I will try to name a single word that best describes you.
5. I'll tell you the most memorable moment I've had with you.
6. I will tell you what color you remind me of.
7. I'll then tell you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. Put this in your journal.

Yes, I stole that from you, Sabrina.

"Reflexion". Only some of the privileged know what this means.

Brittany.

When my eyes turn green my heart cries. When my eyes close my heart stops. When my eyes get wide my heart beats. But most of all when my ill eyes stare my heart sings out for you. I felt infinite.

"High on love. High on our love rock."

Brittany.

I have been happily and unforcefully engaged in a wickedly awesome exclusive relationship with my best friend for two months today. <3

"I know you always feel my eyes but I hope you never feel unwanted."

Brittany.

Separation anxiety...

"This loss to my brain almost feels like a god."

Tonight was the most fairy-tale, picturesque day I've had.

Baby <3 came over around 4 and then the family went to the Spicer's house. First of all, they own half a pond and their house is fucking huge. Spencer and I spent most of the day outside. We made a huge bon fire, ate s'mores, saw fireworks, and it felt so surreal. The sky was pitch black except for lightening that lit up the sky shades of purple and white. Just like in pictures you see hanging in museum galleries. I wish I had my camera. I'd take pictures of you in that tent we snuck into across the pond, and of your gorgeous face that shows the most beautiful soul I've ever seen. I'm so comfortable with you and tonight was one of those movie-nights were a guy would propose or the night would just be so incredible. Even my parents love you enough to want to take you camping with us. And I hope we do, because that would be the greatest. Three nights where I can fall asleep next to you; if only for a weekend's worth, it would be the best weekend of my life. I'm so tired and missing everything about tonight; the kissing in the rain, sitting by the fire pit, the s'mores, the ice cream cake, pool; everything. And I'd never take anything back because little aspect of us has led us up to now; and I know I could never be more in love with anyone.

"In your eyes I lost my place. And I'm melting in your eyes, like my first time."

Brittany.

I'm pretty sure I've never been so calm in my life.

Maybe it's the fact that I'm with Spencer <3 and I know he wouldn't let anything happen to me, or the fact that I know she's psychotic, or the fact that I know her plans completely back-fired and people are still making fun of her. But whatever it was, when she got in my face tonight looking for a rumble, I just laughed and told her she was being immature. "And in that moment, I swear we were infinite." I couldn't give a shit. Maybe because anybody could beat me up, she doesn't seem any different. Tonight turned out to be unexpectedly eventful. I have to say that off the record, I'm a lot better of a person than you will ever be.

The night started with my mom driving me to my Baby's around five. Then around seven we went to the Long Reach Coffee House. It was boring a whole fucking lot of the time, but then two good bands played. I was blown away by this one girl on her guitar. What a wicked sound. Then around 10 Spencer's mom picked Spence and me up and took me home.

I forgot to mention in that last entry that I love my mommy very much.

Once on a yellow piece of paper with green lines

   he wrote a poem

And he called it "Chops"

   because that was the name of his dog

And that's what it was all about

And his teacher gave him an A

   and a gold star

And his mother hung it on the kitchen door

   and read it to his aunts

That was the year Father Tracy

   took all the kids to the zoo

And he let them sing on the bus

Amd his little sister was born

   with tiny toenails and no hair

And his mother and father kissed a lot

And the girl around the corner send him a

   Valentine signed with a row of X's

   and he had to ask his father what the X's meant

And his father always tucked him in bed at night

And was always there to do it

 

Once on a piece of white paper with blue lines

   he wrote a poem

And called it "Autumn"

   because that was the name of the season

And that's what it was all about

And his teacher gave him an A

   and asked him to write more clearly

And his mother never hung it on the kitchen door

   because of its new paint

And the kids told him

   that Father Tracy smoked cigars

And left butts on the pews

And sometimes they would burn holes

That was the year his sister got glasses

   with thick lenses and black frames

And the girl around the corner laughed

   when he asked her to go see Santa Claus

And the kids told him why

   his mother and father kissed a lot

And his father never tucked him in bed at night

And his father got mad

   when he cried for him to do it.

 

Once on a paper torn from his notebook

   he wrote a poem

And he called it "Innocence: A Question"

   because that was the question about his girl

And that's what it was all about

And his professor gave him an A

   and a strange steady look

And his mother never hung it on the kitchen door

   because he never showed her

That was the year that Father Tracy died

And he forgot how the end

   of the Apostle's Creed went

And he caught his sister

   making out on the back porch

And his mother and father never kissed

   or even talked

And the girl around the corner

   wore too much makeup

That made him cough when he kissed her

   but he kissed her anyway

   because that was the thing to do

And at three A.M. he tucked himself into bed

   his father snoring soundly

 

That's why on theback of a brown paper bag

   he tried another poem

And called it "Absolutely Nothing"

Because that's what it was really all about

And he gave himself an A

and a slash on each damned wrist

And he hung it on the bathroom door

   because this time he didn't think

   he could reach the kitchen.

It's so depressing, but at the same time I love it. It's from Perks. Tonight we went to Sushi Sono, I washed my mom's car for her, didn't fight with my sister much, gave her (mom)  gifts, a million kisses, and I hope I did a good job letting her know she's the best mother I could ever ask for.

"Burnt or not I still feel the same about you."

Brittany.

Brittany.

"The heat passion beauty we endure

it too unpainful to be pure

your eyes they shine like fireflies

diamond eyes

in the sky way up high hold on tight

ive never felt so close to alive

touch me feel me poke me breathe me

be me want me as much as I want you

too high to count impossible dreams

no such thing as impossible when with you it seems

tainted love and glorified means."

Yesterday was more fun than..... um.... anything.

Let's go back to time travel.

I slept in until 9:30 and went to get some labwork done. I used to HATE getting blood drawn but now it's nothing. The blood moving through to the vile reminds me of when I used to drink strawberry milk through those really twisty weird straws. I miss those days. So anyway I was starving afterwards and mom took me and the monster (Becky) to Dunkin Doughnuts to get a bagel with cream cheese. Not as good as New York bagels, but whatever. The mommy dearest picked up Spencer <3 and we went to the mall for like .5 seconds. I was supposed to get a suicide peircing done but noone was at Peircing Pagoda? It was fucking aggrivating. I was so excited and we were standing around for five minutes for some worker but no. Asshole. I want my suicide bar. Right now. So then we all went home and I spent nearly eleven hours with Spencer, even though it's not enough. I'm pretty sure it was the best day yet. It made me realize how much I really am in love, all bullshitting aside. Dad got us chinese food and Spencer ended up breaking some guy's car front mirror. Then Spencer left around nine and yeah. I miss you dearly.

Today my dad asked what I was doing today. Surprisly he guessed right. Spencer.

So I'm in love with an extremely emo cd. I can't deny.

"I can't take my eyes off of you."

Brittany.

Instant replay:

Friday: Went to Spencer's <3 house around five then went to the mall with him and Joshy. Got some great times in there. I hate the fact that there's always 2389290358230984 people in the girls' bathroom. Find somewhere else to go, thanks.

Saturday: Passover. Woke up around 9 to my dad asking me if I wanted to drive to Brooklyn to surprise my grandparents (4 hour drive). And yes, yes we did. My grandfather almost had a heart attack he was so happy and my Aunt almost cried? It was great. My Aunt made all of this fucking AWESOME Jewish food. GAH I love REAL Matza. Went to bed around 11.

Sunday: Woke up at 7, ate a New York bagel (that's right, be jealous), because they are the fucking best in the world. Bought three dozen bagels and put them in the fridge/freezer like always. Left my grandparents' house in Brooklyn around 8 and went to my other grandparents' house in NJ. Represent. Left way later than expected because my dad decided to be a doll and fix my grandmother's much fucked-up computer. I finished my 7 page outline for Kibler in the car. On the way home we decided to stop by Verizon (FINALLY) and I got a new phone. A REAL one this time. It's bloody awesome. I have a real screen and everything. Oh yeah, and I up-ed my text messaging plan to 1000 because that's how many I spent last month where my limit's only 200 and I had to pay $44? Mom wasn't too happy about that. So now I have to program all the damn bloody numbers into that. So Spencer and I tried to watch Boogeyman but that blew, hard core. I was feeling sick to the max but Spencer took care of me and made me feel a whole lot better. Baby left around 9 and then I typed up my outline, making it a total of only 5 pages.

 

So today didn't blow as much as I thought it would. In biology we did shit, and in Spanish, Wolters just let us watch Shrek 2 in Spanish. Wow. Does that ruin the movie. A bunch of Mexicans with horribe voice overs just ruined the whole god damn thing. Then in Kibler's I was supposed to give a huge presentation that I was nervous as shit about but I didn't have to go, and after seeing how shitty some of the presentations were I'm not so scared anymore. This one girl Melissa had no idea about any part of her murder case. None. What-so-ever. Cero. Zippidy-doo-da. So I guess that mine can't be the worst tomorrow. I forgot to say that over the weekend I finally got The Perks of Being a Wallflower and I fucking love that book. I came up with the best birthday gift for Spencer while reading it too. Gah. My stomach still hurts and Mrs. Delcotto just gave me a 7 out of 10 on a slogan project for this class. It says "Computers are for winners." How can you go wrong. That bastard.

She said it was over.

Brittany.
